file_content.text: Thanks to you, our operations are running much more smoothly now.
I hope you can appropriate the alien broadcasting station and communications system. Make a big difference around here.
Your arrival is very timely. I've uncovered something that could have a great impact on Republic operations here.
The SIS assigned me to track Imperial communications. In my sweeps, I pinpointed a strange, looped transmission from deep within the ancient prison.
It's no language I've ever heard. Probably left by the species that built that place!
I'm intrigued.
I know, right? The implications are widespread.
Why does this matter?
Why does this matter?
Why waste time with this?
Don't you see the implications?
The signal's broadcasting to stations throughout the ancient part of the prison. That means there's a full communications system in place here.
If we could bypass the system's security and use it ourselves, we could coordinate our efforts and mobilize so much more effectively.
That's important.
Hoping the Imperials haven't thought of it. I sent warden droids in to retrieve the passkey we need to bypass the broadcast station's security.
So, do it yourself.
Me? I'm not equipped for forward penetrations. I sent warden droids in to retrieve the passkey we need to bypass the broadcast station's security.
Received a success signal, then Esh-kha flooded the area and destroyed my droids.
Hoping you can fight through the Esh-kha, salvage the key, then find the broadcast station and open the prison's communications system.
What needs to be done?
First, we need the passkey. I sent a team of warden droids after it--they signaled success, then Esh-kha flooded the area.
So, you'd have to fight Esh-kha, salvage the key, then find the broadcast station and bypass its security to open the prison's communications system.
No time like the present.
Your dedication inspires me.
Once you've unlocked the system, use it to contact me on this frequency. I'll inform all live teams that it's activated and ready for use.
Take it under advisement.
If you decide to take it on, after unlocking the communications system, you can use it to contact me.
Then I can inform all live teams that it's activated and available for use.
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
Too bad. An advantage like this could save lives and accomplish our objectives.
What's involved?
